== Batim (626722) ==
      
Batim is a village in the [[Tiswadi]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 275.52 hectares and harbouring 356 households with total population of 1489 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 739 and female population is 750. Scheduled Caste Population is 12 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the village is 626722<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
